paper_abstract: This paper investigates an iterative Boolean-like law with fuzzy implications derived from uninorms. More precisely, we characterize the solutions to the functional equation I(x, y) = I(x, I(x, y)) that involve RU-, (UN)- and QLU-implications generated by the most usual classes of uninorms. (C) 2011 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Solutions to the functional equation I(x, y) = I(x, I(x, y)) for three types of fuzzy implications derived from uninorms
